attributes.action: More focused and aggressive public awareness campaign on Hepatitis C & HIV
attributes.additional_details:
A more focused and aggressive campaign is required for HIV & Hepatitis C to combat increasing infection rates.

Education is needed to combat complacency of HIV infection and that despite new treatment regimes their is still major health implications even with an undetectable viral load.

Education is also required in the transmission route of Hepatitis C and it's subsequent health implications as  Hepatitis C rates are increasing at alarming levels.

If transmission rates continue at current levels it will take up a huge amount of resources from the NHS.
